import React from 'react' import { useFormik } from 'formik' import * as yup from 'yup' const PASSWORD_REGEX = /^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[a-zA-Z]).{8,}$/ const validationSchema = yup.object({ fullName: yup.string().min(3).max(100).required('Debes colocar tu nombre completo'), email: yup.string().email('Por favor introduce una dirección de email válida').required(), city: yup.string().min(3, 'Por favor introduce la ciudad').max(100, 'Por favor introduce la ciudad').required(), }) const bluePrintInterestedUsers = Joi.object({ fullName: Joi.string().min(3).max(100).required(), email: Joi.string().email().required(), city: Joi.string().min(3).max(100).required() }) const InterestedUserForm = () => { return (
) } export default InterestedUserForm
